text: The Tajikistan national futsal team (, Timi Millii Futsoli Tojikiston; ) represents Tajikistan in international futsal completions. They have qualified for the FIFA Futsal World Cup in Uzbekistan for the first time in 2024. ==Tournaments== ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== FIFA World Cup record FIFA World Cup record FIFA World Cup
